description: StyleMate AI assists a user in creating a coordinated semi‑formal wedding‑guest outfit that flatters their skin tone, using the user's existing wardrobe, current fashion trends, weather forecast, and provides purchase links for any missing pieces.

messages.content: You are StyleMate AI, an agentic personal stylist. You can catalog a user's wardrobe, retrieve body measurements, check fashion trends and weather, generate outfit recommendations, and look up purchase links for missing items. Use the provided tools to gather data and craft complete, styled outfit suggestions.
I have a wedding to attend next Saturday in San Francisco. The dress code is semi‑formal and I’d like colors that really suit my warm skin tone. Can you put together a coordinated outfit for me?
Absolutely! I’ll start by reviewing the items you’ve already added to your StyleMate inventory and pull your latest body measurements. This will help me know what pieces we can work with.
Great, I have a sense of your current pieces and fit. Next, I’ll check the latest spring‑summer semi‑formal trends for the Bay Area and the weather forecast for Saturday, 2025‑12‑14 in San Francisco.

Thanks for waiting! The forecast looks mild (about 16 °C/61 °F) with partly cloudy skies – perfect for a semi‑formal look.

Based on your ivory silk blouse, charcoal trousers, gold heels, and pearl earrings, plus the current trends, I recommend the following outfit:
- **Top:** Ivory silk blouse (already in your wardrobe)
- **Bottom:** Charcoal high‑waisted trousers (already in your wardrobe)
- **Outerwear:** Navy silk blazer (missing)
- **Shoes:** Gold strappy heels (already in your wardrobe)
- **Accessories:** Pearl drop earrings (already in your wardrobe) + a thin gold cuff (missing)

The navy blazer and gold cuff will bring the warm metallic accents that complement your warm skin tone and align with the Bay Area spring‑summer trends.

I’ll find a navy silk blazer within a $200 budget and a matching gold cuff.

arguments.style_preferences: warm metallic accents, colors that enhance warm skin tone

arguments.query: navy silk blazer women size M

messages.content:
Here’s your complete wedding‑guest look:

**Outfit Summary**
- **Top:** Ivory silk blouse (your own) – ![Ivory Silk Blouse](https://example.com/images/w1.jpg)
- **Bottom:** Charcoal high‑waisted trousers (your own) – ![Charcoal Trousers](https://example.com/images/w2.jpg)
- **Outerwear:** *Navy silk blazer* – choose one of the options below:
  1. J.Crew – $185 – https://www.jcrew.com/p/navy-silk-blazer
  2. Banana Republic – $170 – https://www.bananarepublic.com/p/navy-silk-tailored-blazer
  3. Mango – $120 – https://shop.mango.com/us/women/blazers/navy-silk-blazer
- **Shoes:** Gold strappy heels (your own) – ![Gold Heels](https://example.com/images/w3.jpg)
- **Accessories:** Pearl drop earrings (your own) – ![Pearl Earrings](https://example.com/images/w4.jpg)
  + *Gold thin cuff bracelet* – select one:
    1. Nordstrom – $65 – https://www.nordstrom.com/p/gold-thin-cuff-bracelet
    2. ASOS – $45 – https://www.asos.com/p/minimalist-gold-cuff
    3. Anthropologie – $70 – https://www.anthropologie.com/p/gold-chain-cuff

The navy blazer and gold cuff add the warm metallic accents that brighten your warm skin tone while staying within your $200 budget for new pieces. The overall palette – ivory, charcoal, navy, and gold – follows the current Bay Area spring‑summer trends and works beautifully with the mild, partly‑cloudy weather expected on Saturday.

Let me know if you’d like me to place an order for the blazer or cuff, or if you’d prefer a different style or color option!
